name.th: เครื่องมือเผยแพร่สินค้าเป็นชุด
name.vi: Công cụ tải lên hàng loạt

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BigSeller Product Scraper, scrape products from marketplaces to your multiple stores.
short.id: Mendukung Membuat Flash Sale Shopee Secara Massal, Meningkatkan Efisiensi Operasional Secara Keseluruhan
short.th: BigSeller Product Scraper สามารถเครปสินค้าของหลายช่องทางและเผยแพร่ไปยังร้านค้าออนไลน์ของคุณ
short.vi: BigSeller - Product Scraper, sao chép sản phẩm từ đa sàn đến nhiều gian hàng của bạn.
short.zh_CN: BigSeller Product Scraper，支持多平台采集后快速发布到线上店铺

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Covers multiple mainstream supply platforms for product sourcing, helping sellers select and find products. One-click Product Collection and Copy Listings make it time-saving and efficient. The collection tool is free to use for good
